author: adrianc
msg: New models for the serviceengine.xml file. They are not used yet - the ServiceConfigUtil class needs to be updated to use them, as well as other code that uses ServiceConfigUtil. The new models were contributed by Christoph Neuroth and were refactored by me.

author: svn-role
msg: Fix issue #4370 '(m)erge interactive conflict resolution segfaults when cwd
Prevents a segfault in the new 'internal text conflict merge tool'.
+1: pburba (for 1.8.0:  This isn't a 'destabilizing' change per my
reading of our release-stabilization guidelines, so it can
be included in 1.8.0 without a soak restart.)
